short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Opens any Jupyter notebook or clones a repository on Segmind.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
What Does this extension do?
* Opens a Github repo on Segmind platform.
* Opens python notebooks (.ipynb files) on Segmind platform.
* Integration with Paperswithcode and Arxiv lets you open listed Github repos on Segmind.
* Scans for all the Github repos/links on current web page and displays hyperlinks to open them directly on Segmind platform.
